Header: A person arrested with explosives from Bandarawela
Content: Police arrested a person yesterday for possessing a stock of explosives with a license from Bandarawela. Police seized 765 grams of high explosives, 1.8 kilo grams of Amonia Nitrate and 4 detonators. The 45 year old suspect will be produced before the magistrateâ€™s court today.
